questions.question: Choose the correct sentence
options: The car runned out of gas yesterday.
She is driving to the mechanic because her car broke down.
He didn't knew how to change the tire.
The cars was parked in the garage.
questions.answer: She is driving to the mechanic because her car broke down.

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence
options: The driver was speeding because he had missed the traffic light.
They was washing their cars when it started to rain.
She has drove her new car to work today.
The engine don't starts when it's cold.
questions.answer: The driver was speeding because he had missed the traffic light.

questions.question: What is the part of the car that helps reduce the impact of a collision?
What is the name of the pedal that controls the speed of the car?
